boardgame.name: Bote salvavidas
Lifeboat
Les Naufragés du Titanic
За бортом!
怒海求生
boardgame.description: from original publishers' Web site_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Adrift in uncharted waters, six people share a tiny lifeboat. As the supplies run low, they discover that some barrels are filled with jewels and art treasures instead of water or hardtack. Greed mixes with love and hatred as the passengers take sides..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Lifeboat is a fast-paced card game of intrigue and survival. Players vie for the highest score when the boat reaches land _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; a seemingly simple matter of surviving with the most treasure. But each player has a secret love and a secret enemy among the passengers, and no one knows when landfall will occur._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will you help row, and thus have a hand in guiding the boat's course? Try to shove your way into the quartermaster's seat? Start a fight to grab some loot? Or just bide your time until you can nudge your enemy overboard into shark-infested waters?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Good The Board and The Impossible: Episode 110 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Games We Suck At_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Buyer to pay for shipping from California.

Brand new and factory sealed! Gamers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Inn is a real store in Mesa AZ, and will ship via DHL Ground or the USPS. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. All games can ship international, and we will quote costs upon request. Delivery confirmation goes with every order. We do our best to give an accurate description of condition, and will ship them safely and quickly, and we will gladly combine shipping costs. In store pickup _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; payment is available with no shipping or handling charges. Arizona residents must pay 7.5% sales tax. About us: We can be reached at: info@gamersinnaz.com The store is open 24/7/365 and can be phoned at: 480-507-0509 Street address: 1232 E Southern Ave, Mesa, AZ 85204 You can check out our history as a Power Seller on eBay at: http://myworld.ebay.com/gamers_inn or on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/shops/index.html/104-7806078-3093525?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;sellerID=A2M6J42JR1XQD Our home page: http://www.gamersinnaz.com

Gorilla Games (OOC 0702) by Jeff Siadek Your ship has sunk, and now you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re adrift at sea aboard a lifeboat with your secret love and a secret enemy! Each of you are trying to survive the hardship of the sea, but will you survive each other? This Gorilla Games card came has nothing to do with Battlestations, except it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fun and designed by Jeff Siadek. The box contains: 42 Provision Cards 6 Character Cards 6 Character Cards 6 Placeholder Cards 6 Hate Cards 6 Love Cards 24 Navigation Cards 4-6 Players, 1 Hour Playing Time, ages 10+
Excellent Unplayed Condition UK Postage £2.50
